knowledge_base.answer: Hello! How can I help you with Qasemi IT services? / שלום! איך אוכל לעזור לך בשירותי ה-IT?
You can find the academic calendar for 2025/2026 here: Academic Calendar 2025/2026
Login to Moodle here: Moodle Portal
To reset your password, visit the Student Portal and click 'Forgot Password'.
Connect to 'QSM-Students' using your ID and portal password.
You can open a support ticket here: Support Page
